text: Kissi aisay insan ko jissay Allah Taalaa kitab-o-hikmat aur nabooat dey yeh laeeq nahi kay phir bhi woh logon say kahey kay tum Allah Taalaa ko chor ker meray banday bann jao bulkay woh to kahey ga kay tum sab rab kay ho jao tumharay kitab sikhaney kay baees aur tumharay kitab parhney kay sabab
